post: “And, Lord, if it be your will, Let Christopher speak some more” At this point I’m sure God has turned His back on Hitchens. Why should God grant him full or partial healing when Hidchens has blasphemed and ridiculed God all of his adult life. Hitchens destiny is eternally set from which he’ll reap his rewards for all eternity, I’m really sorry Hitchens….
title: The Great Christopher Hitchens Has Lost His Voice
